channel.title: Custom Payloads on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Custom Payloads on ZAP

item.title: Custom Payloads API
item.description: Cusotm Payloads API The following views are available via the API: Views customPayloads(category): Lists all the payloads currently loaded (category, payload, enabled state). Optionally filtered by category. customPayloadsCategories: Lists all the available categories. Actions addCustomPayload (category*, payload): Adds a custom payload (enabled when added). disableCustomPayloads(category): Disables custom payloads.
